website_summaries.verdict: A top choice in terms of value for a good quality inflatable lounger.
pros: Comes in a choice of black or blue
cons: Inflates more easily if you have some sort of wind to work with
Be aware of potential quality issues such as ripped fabric right out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun product!! It is winter for sooooo many months where i live so i love to purchase things that can entertain my boys in the long cold months inside. A fun new inflatable couch was just the thing. It took a minute for us to figure out how to inflate but the boys are loving it! Tip: you either need some wind to help with the inflating process or a long stretch of straightaway to run and inflate. Two runs or swipes into the wind gets enough air to roll it down and clip closed! I hope This review helps someone! We had a good 15 minuets of trial and error and looking a bit silly.
customer_reviews.author: darby dog

customer_reviews.title: Great lounger for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and so comfortable. I have used it both inside and outside of the house. When inside I used a box fan to inflate, twist to seal, and sat super easy. It stayed inflated the hole time I was binging on Netflix, no issues. Then outside I just ran in a straight line for a few seconds to get enough air then twisted to seal and sat! Like other reviewers have stated the material does get a little hot in the sun, but what chair doesn't!!! Just bring a towel. Love this chair!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DLS

customer_reviews.title: Garbage !!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that the product is no longer available in the Amazon store but this product was just useless and doesn't work like what is shown in the video description. The video made it so easy to inflate and use but in fact it is extremely hard to inflate and even if you do it won't provide enough height so basically your body will be touching the ground. Please do yourself a favor and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: biomeddit

customer_reviews.title: ᕙ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ᕗ
customer_reviews.text: VERY hard to fill with air. Don't believe the commercials, you have to fill it on a windy day. Comfortable overall, but loses air quicker than I thought it would. You seal it like you would a dry bag, so you want to get at least 4 good folds on the end before cinching it shut. Kinda slipper too, but overall cool to have. The kids love it. I'm a larger than normal guy and it holds me, but it is a little tough getting out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefen von Horten II

customer_reviews.title: Easy alternative to a hammock!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this inflatable lounger! It took a couple tries to figure out the best way to inflate it (hint : it's much easier to do outside where you have lots of room!). But, once you get it inflated, it's very comfortable! I would say it's similar to a hammock but you don't have to hang it from trees! I'm excited to take this camping and to the beach. The product seems well made and I expect it should last a long time! Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient couch
customer_reviews.text: We love this lounger. It is easy to set up, just swoop with the end open, close it, and repeat. After 6-8 swoops there is plenty of air to make a comfy recliner. Then just roll the end shut and clip the lock to hold it tightly closed. Ours sits in the TV room for the kids to use, and it has remained inflated for days at a time, so it seems air tight. When we need more room for other activities we can simply deflate this couch, and put it away in its little storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: FluffpuppypupTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor activities!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight & portable for on the go activities. This was easy to fill with air once you get the hang of it. For inside use- a hairdryer works awesome, super fast too. This will be ideal for outdoor movies and concerts at the park this summer. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi K

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying I will get another one
customer_reviews.text: I watched a lot of YouTube videos on how to inflate it. None of the ideas worked for me. I ended up using a air mattress pump. I gave three stars because it doesn’t stay inflated. Once you sit on it it’s fine but if you get up you have to inflate it all over again. All in all my boys love it. Once you find the inflation method that works for you it’s all good.
customer_reviews.author: Qushonda McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Not to get blown up. The funniest thing trying to watch my husband and brother who are athletes, put wind in this.wouldnt work, aan at nearby campsite offered us to use his fan blew it right up . Air did not last real long with kids .
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Idea hurrah. Performance pashaw.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is much lower to the ground than in the picture. The material seems sturdy but looses air slowly. That means that you can lie down and within 10 to 20 minutes your butt has made an earth landing. Hurrah for the idea. Pashaw for the real world performance.
customer_reviews.author: DctR

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to fill!!! Once filled doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Just like any other lounge chair. It is impossible to fill without a ton of wind!!! Running won't work. It's not very practical if you can't fill it without wind. We had to use our portable AC unit and Im not going to be taking the AC unit to the park to fill my lounge chair. It also doesn't hold air for long. We've had to refill it 3 times today.
customer_reviews.author: carmin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Although this product is hard to inflate, once it’s done it’s a blast. I have floated in the pool with it and had a comfortable place to sit or lay while camping. Just for fun we tried sitting 3 people on it and we all fit comfortably. It’s a good fun product once you get it inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Colegrove

customer_reviews.title: You should have this
customer_reviews.text: Here is my new entertainment product. We as a family made a too much outdoor activity picnic and such. I enjoyed using this. The product is straightforward to set up. And the quality is excellent. It is safe and good enough for family entertainment. I strongly recommend to keep one at hiome for possible outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: Ike Fydone

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I risked my self image to inflate this thing...no wind around these parts...ran around the yard like a mad man trying to fill this thing! Success. All worth it. Great for use on land and sea! Make sure you roll it really tight to trap the air inside! Very comfy!! Could probably use to sleep on...does make a bit of a noise if you’re moving around trying to get comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Za

customer_reviews.title: Works decent.
customer_reviews.text: It works decent. It can be difficult to get the air in. I found it easier to put it in front of a fan and fill it that way. But it is pretty comfy. It does lose air though, so every hour you have to refill
customer_reviews.author: TheWhistler

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea but not as useful in reality
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to inflate and air releases when weight is applied. Ended up throwing it away (and purchasing a hammock) because it doesn’t easily shrink back down to fit into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jacq

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made in a while.
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly the best thing since sliced cheese. I fill this bad boy up pretty much anywhere I go and I want to lay out in the sun. Took it to the beach and since it was windy, it took all of 1/2 a second to fill up. (Soooo much more comfortable than laying on the hard sand at the beach)
customer_reviews.author: Vid

customer_reviews.title: We didn't like it.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it to blow up. Had to use an electric air pump. Not very comfortable. After several tries to go places with it. We threw it away. It was not worth all the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I think there are plastic sheets inside that ...
customer_reviews.text: Too difficult to get these filled with air on the beach. Tried two different days. Very disappointed. I think there are plastic sheets inside that are weighing it down. Other comparable products may work as shown on videos.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bieger

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved his inflatable lounger that I purchased for him as ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved his inflatable lounger that I purchased for him as a gift. Unfortunately, it did not come with instructions for inflating, but we were able to easily find some online.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Robison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fun product. Perfect for my grandsons to sleep over. Love that it has a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money
customer_reviews.text: Crap product. 1st time i used it the seam split and the bladder pooped out. I have several other but this was the fist one to fail.
customer_reviews.author: Memamo

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as described
customer_reviews.text: We were never ever able inflate this tging is not as easy as they make it out to be and it doesn’t keep any air inside either
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great little lounger
customer_reviews.text: What a great little lounger. It inflates and deflates super easily and it is so comfortable. I love how versatile it is. It can be used at home, camping, in the pool, on trips and/or for guests. The possibilities are endless.
customer_reviews.author: DEBB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Busted this out in my back yard as it got hotter now, spring time! Gotta say it was fairly simple to use. Just wave it in the air to fill it up with the air and then just keep rolling to your preferred size. Pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Doesn't plump up as shown.
customer_reviews.text: The couch refused to inflate. We followed the directions and moved the sack in a swift motion to catch air, but it just wouldn't fill up. We even ran up and down the street to get as much air inside the thing as we could but in the end the couch only got about 1/3 full. Total fail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The price was fantastic, but you get what you pay for. Filled it up and it had a slow leak. Then we went to pick it up and noticed the real problem. Bad sewing job. A whole side was not attached. :/
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Fun to relax and sit on it.
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to inflate it and get it full of air at first but the videos on YouTube really help us get the right technique. It’s fun to rest and relax on it.
customer_reviews.author: runner

customer_reviews.title: Deflating chair
customer_reviews.text: Stupidest purchase ever does not inflate easy but just sit on it and the air will go right out
customer_reviews.author: Shelly lund

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.text: We use at lawn concerts and it is comfortable for two of us to sit on. It’s not 100% air tight so it does lose air but not hard to fill back up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Steele

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Got this for dirty Santa gift we couldn’t get it blown up to have it work - crap
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosha

customer_reviews.title: This isn’t filling up with air. My children and ...
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t filling up with air. My children and I have done everything possible to inflate the lounge chair and it will not til up! We have followed all instructions and tried getting creative but it never actually fills up. Any tips? We are very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: horrible does not hold air save ur cash for something better
customer_reviews.author: Teresa W.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for... garbage
customer_reviews.text: Within one day the seams came undone on the bottom. The thing is incredibly difficult to air up and takes a lot of effort. Oh, and it apparently just popped entirely while writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose, but low quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product at first, but it lasted a couple of days before one of the sofas kinda exploded. Ideal for kids, but not resistant for heavy-weight people
customer_reviews.author: Christian Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't really get fully inflated even with a shop vac that we turned from suck to
customer_reviews.text: No person on the planet can "run" to inflate this. Couldn't really get fully inflated even with a shop vac that we turned from suck to blow
customer_reviews.author: Mike Oxmal

customer_reviews.title: Can't inflate, leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to inflate. Maybe in a hurricane, but otherwise not easy. Also does not hold air once you get some in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a joke! You are suppose to spin around and catch air to blow it up. It was a present for my sons birthday definitely a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: jenny zinab

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was great about the refund though
customer_reviews.text: This is not a product for anyone over 45 pounds, no matter what the box says. Really. Amazon was great about the refund though.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it to fully inflate, no matter how many times I tried
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be a great grab bag gift but no one wanted it once ...
customer_reviews.text: No one in my family could get this thing inflated. Thought it would be a great grab bag gift but no one wanted it once it was clear no one could work it!
customer_reviews.author: kerrie s.

customer_reviews.title: Dad is jealous
customer_reviews.text: My teenage grandson lives it and I think dad is jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Busted pretty much as soon as it was sat on, by a child. Neat product, just don't buy this one. Asked for a replacement never heard back from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: bad seams
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality..2 out of the 3 I bought the seams came out. They were comfortable for the whole 1 hour I got to use mine.
customer_reviews.author: angel brackett

customer_reviews.title: to much hassle
customer_reviews.text: difficult to fill, also hard to keep it closed once filled
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Came apart at the seams on the first use even though was used by a 104-lb woman!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It’s a joke does not fill with air or hold air if you manage to get some in
customer_reviews.author: Alan Dranoff

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish.  Single use effectively
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product. Split at the seams after 3 uses. Don’t recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: It split at the seams the first time we tried using it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Depagnier

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: It ripped the bottom on the first use. I really would like to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Horrible the seam split on the nylon within The first hour of use
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIAN

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product waste of money, does not inflate enough to use, holds very little air.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Came ripped!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to use but it came ripped on the bottom. Terrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no rips no jumping on- very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son for Valentine’s Day (he is 33 lbs) filled on several occasions and rolled tight- will not hold air for more than 30 or so minutes. Has been treated well, no rips no jumping on- very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: ccchaos

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time with this item. Fabric busted first day of use. I would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t inflate
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this thing to inflate. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronique Desautels

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold air. Had a difficult time even getting air in it
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Holder

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift and have not heard how the recipient liked
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift and have not heard how the recipient liked it
customer_reviews.author: Kristi R

customer_reviews.title: Seam broke after a couple hours, unusable
customer_reviews.text: I was weary about the reviews and I should have paid more attention. The seam burst after using it on day 2 of our beach trip. After only a couple hours of use. I’m requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: lizard

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this because we're going camping tomorrow, so I try it out and it rips on my 50lb kid!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good holds air decently long but does deflate faster than expected still very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: DONT order. FIRST TIME USED
customer_reviews.text: NOPE! Ripped under my 170lbs on first use at beach. Enough said
customer_reviews.author: A m

customer_reviews.title: Does not work did not work!!!! Air went out less than 20  min
customer_reviews.text: It's not worth it does not work@!! Air goes out less than 20 min!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charisse D.
